channel.title: Aiea Dentist - www.wemakehawaiismile.com
channel.description: Japanese Dentist Honolulu - Modern dentistry offers a wide variety of treatment options for people seeking to enhance their smile. The options range from porcelain veneers to braces

item.title: Aiea Japanese Dentist - www.wemakehawaiismile.com
item.description: Japanese Dentist Honolulu - Modern dentistry offers a wide variety of treatment options for people seeking to enhance their smile. The options range from porcelain veneers to braces

item.title: Honolulu - Vizilite
item.description: Because early detection is the key to successful outcomes, this practice has incorporated ViziLite, an FDA-cleared medical technology for oral screening to ensure that you receive the most comprehensive oral cancer screening possible.

item.title: Aiea - Porcelain Veneers page 2
item.description: Cosmetic dental work often involves a substantial investment, and may require special maintenance to help keep it looking its best. Cosmetic dentists with many years experience in the field, have valuable insights into keeping your dental work looking great for years to come.

item.title: Aiea - Diagnodent
item.description: Many cosmetic dental offices are proud to use Diagnodent, a laser detection system that has the ability to detect hidden decay under seemingly intact tooth structure. The Diagnodent scans the area with a laser light that is harmless.

item.title: Aiea - Cerec Crowns
item.description: For you, the patient, this means fewer injections, less drilling, and less time out of your hectic schedule for dental care . So, why are thousands of people world wide choosing the CEREC restorative technique for their dental needs?

item.title: Honolulu - Tooth Whitening Intro
item.description: How white an individual tooth can become from bleaching and whitening is a common question. Some whitening procedures claim they can whiten your teeth by up to nine shades, but that is highly unlikely.

item.title: Aiea - Tooth Whitening
item.description: Supervised bleaching procedures that are done in-office and at-home have become among the most popular treatment options. In some cases, the procedure is performed entirely in the office, using a light or heat source to speed up the bleaching process.

item.title: Honolulu - Laser Teeth Whitening
item.description: With the trays method you place the gel in the trays and wear the whitening gel for about an hour a day over a period of a few weeks. A dazzling smile isn't just for celebrities any more. It's also for you, because you're worth it.

item.title: Aiea - Zoom Whitening
item.description: The Zoom! In-Office Whitening System is a revolutionary tooth whitening procedure. It's safe effective and fast, very fast. In just over an hour, your teeth will be dramatically whiter. Zoom! Whitening is ideal for anyone looking for immediate results.

item.title: Aiea - Endodontics
item.description: With today's modern dental techniques, having root canals done by a dentist is no longer a scary experience. Locate a dentist who is experienced in performing root canal therapy.

item.title: Aiea - Children's Dentistry
item.description: The dramatic drop in cavities among children with regular dental care is due to regular visits to the dentist starting at an early age, professional teeth cleaning for children, proper tooth brushing habits, fluoride, and dental sealants.

item.title: Aiea - Laser Dentistry
item.description: Our office recently purchased a water laser and have been implementing the device for various procedures.. This versatile device performs a host of both tooth and soft tissue related procedures, often times with no need for local anesthesia.

item.title: Honolulu - Periodontics
item.description: Periodontal treatment starts with prevention: regular cleanings and good hygeine habits are excellent precautions to take to avoid gum disease.

item.title: Aiea - Non Metal Fillings
item.description: With the amazing advancements that have been made in modern dentistry, metal amalgam fillings are now obsolete. Today's tooth-colored composites are safer, stronger, more attractive and more enduring alternatives to metal.

item.title: Honolulu - Digital Xrays
item.description: Digital X-rays are images that are taken digitally and loaded into a computer file especially for a specific patient.
